name: reserve
description:
Reserves a time on the Dungeon Reservation Calendar.
*Intended for use by Title Managers and Officers.*

fields.name: month
fields.desc: Sets the month of the reservation.

fields.name: day
fields.desc: Sets the date number of the reservation.

fields.name: startHour
fields.desc: Sets the start hour of the reservation.

fields.name: am-pm
fields.desc: Sets the AM/PM for the hour.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: Sets the title of the reservation.

name: schedmatch
description:
Schedules a match onto the corresponding Google Calendar and posts the match information in the appropriate channel.
*Intended for use by Title Managers and Officers.*

fields.name: game
fields.desc: Sets the game of the event.

fields.name: team
fields.desc: Specifies what type of team is playing.

fields.name: month
fields.desc: Sets the month of the event.

fields.name: day
fields.desc: Sets the date number of the event.

fields.name: hour
fields.desc: Sets the hour of the event.

fields.name: minute
fields.desc: Sets the minute of the event.

fields.name: am-pm
fields.desc: Sets the AM/PM of the hour.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: Sets the title of the event.

fields.name: event-league
fields.desc: Sets the event or league of the event.

fields.name: opponent
fields.desc: Sets the opposing University of the event.

fields.name: bracket-link
fields.desc: Sets the link of the bracket of the event.

fields.name: stream-link
fields.desc: Sets the link of the stream of the event.

fields.name: opponent-socials
fields.desc: Sets the socials of the opponent.

fields.name: hashtag
fields.desc: Sets the hashtags of the event.

name: write
description:
Creates a message in a specified channel sent by the bot.
*Must have edit message permissions*

fields.name: channel
fields.desc: Selects the channel where the message will be sent.

fields.name: message
fields.desc: The body of the message to be sent.

name: edit
description:
Edits a message that has been sent by the bot.
*Same permissions as /write.*

fields.name: channel
fields.desc: Selects the channel in which the message has been sent.

fields.name: message-id
fields.desc: The ID of the message to be edited.

fields.name: message-body
fields.desc: The new text of the message to be edited.

name: setchannel
description:
Sets a dedicated channel for a command.
*Must have manage channel permissions*

fields.name: command
fields.desc: Selects a command from a list.

fields.name: channel
fields.desc: Selects a channel to dedicate for the command.
